alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Kipahulu; Koolau Windward; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 17 at 3:35PM HST until December 18 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND BIG ISLAND... .A moderate, short period north swell, along with days of amped up trades, has prompted a High Surf Advisory for most east-facing shores this afternoon. A moderate size, medium period northeast swell arriving from a gale low fetch northeast of the islands will hold eastern exposure surf at HSA levels through at least late Monday afternoon and likely into Tuesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Surf 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...East facing shores of Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui, and Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
